thread.section_title: New World Beijing Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Chinese Restaurant
thread.title_full: Great Chinese Restaurant - Review of New World Beijing Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Scarlip
title: Great Chinese Restaurant
text: Very nice hotel, great location, had lunch at the Chinese restaurant and it was absolutely magnificent, the fish dish was just delicious and so was the chicken and all the vegetables were crunchy and very well prepared, great service as well and super clean, I travel in China a lot and I have become familiar with Chinese food and I can easily say that this was one of the very best, worth the try.
